name: Knights in the Nightmare
description:
Within an abandoned, long-forgotten church deep in the woods, the Wisp is set free. Bereft of memory, it is drawn toward the monster-infested castle as it re-awakens the soulds of vanquished knights, leading them to confront the very forces of evil that took their lives. Now, this drama-filled journey of life and death and ceaseless, bullet-riddled battles is in your hands...
